Package model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
model.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents the game board of a game of Snake
Author:
Kayla Pierson

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int width, int height, int numPellets, javafx.scene.paint.Color backgroundColor, javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, Snake snake)
      Create a new game board with the specified size and background color
      Parameters:
      width - An integer representing the width of the board
      height - An integer representing the height of the board
      backgroundColor - A Color representing the color of the board
      gc - A GraphicsContext used to draw the game board
      snake - A Snake object representing the player

    • isCollision

      public boolean isCollision()
      Checks collision of the Snake's body that results in a game over
      Returns:
      True if the Snake has hit the walls of the board or itself, False otherwise
